rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to a living area that opens into the garden. Large windows for natural light, sliding glass doors for ventilation, and wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ample lighting, quiet location, sound insulation, and integrated smart technology, ensuring a conducive work environment while being fully wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A master bedroom designed for relaxation with natural light, an ensuite bathroom adjacent to it, built following Vastu principles of tranquility and health. Fully accessible.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Guest bedroom optimized for ventilation and sunlight exposure, including space for a compact en-suite bathroom that respects privacy while adhering to local building norms.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Ensuite bathroom for Master Bedroom 1 with modern fixtures and a barrier-free design ensuring accessibility. Vastu-aligned layout promoting positive energy flow.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A wide, wheelchair-accessible door with automatic opening system for ease of entry and exit.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Doors
openings.description: Provides connection between living area and garden ensuring natural light ingress and ventilation while preserving energy efficiency.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Large, strategically placed windows in all rooms to ensure maximum natural lighting and cross-ventilation as per Vastu guidelines and modern design principles.
